title: Machine Learning-based Early Delirium Prediction Modeling After Microvascular Decompression

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistics, Python Programming Experience, and Fundamental Machine Learning Concepts
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course for medical data analysis and machine learning model development, conducted through blended online/offline classes using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can identify key predictor variables (features) in medical datasets and preprocess them.
Learners can solve binary classification problems by utilizing ensemble models such as Random Forest/GBM (Gradient Boosting Machine).
Learners can compare and analyze model performance using evaluation metrics such as AUC (Area Under the Curve)/accuracy.

resources: Python (Jupyter Notebook), Scikit-learn, and Medical Dataset Samples

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
